message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now than to lose value with each round.
Your money is losing value fast, Alice. Let's be reasonable. I'll take a slight majority.
Bob, my friend, let's be real. The value is slipping away with each round.  I'll take a little less than my initial offer, you get a bit more than your offer. Deal?
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before it depreciates even further!
Okay, Bob, you drive a hard bargain.  Let's settle this now. This is the same split you offered me, but at this point it's the best I'm going to do.
